document_api_meta.title: Update Inventory
document_api_meta.env_desc: Update the inventory quantity of SKUs belonging to a product in the `ACTIVATE` status.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: skus
request_body_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU ID generated by TikTok Shop. One product can contain multiple SKU IDs.

**Note**: 
- The SKU ID must belong to a product with the `ACTIVATE` status.
- If you are updating multiple SKUs, all the SKU IDs must belong to the same product.

request_body_param.name: ^inventory
request_body_param.desc:
SKU inventory information.
**Note**: You must include all warehouse IDs assigned to this SKU, along with the respective quantity. Do not omit any or add unrelated warehouses.

request_body_param.name: ^^warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc:
The ID of the warehouse where the SKU is stored. Retrieve this value from the [Get Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda).

**Note**: Optional if there is only 1 warehouse. Otherwise, please provide this ID.

request_body_param.name: ^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The total SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 99,999]

Note: This quantity specifically refers to the in-stock inventory that can be shipped immediately.

request_body_param.name: ^^backorder_quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The `backorder_quantity` will automatically be converted to `quantity` once in-stock inventory is sold out. The fulfillment of this inventory follows the `handling_time` specified below.

Note: Any existing `backorder_quantity` will persist if no update is provided during API call.

request_body_param.name: ^^handling_time
request_body_param.desc: The estimated number of working days needed for a backorder to be shipped. Currently, different warehouses for the same SKU are not allowed to have different `handling_time`

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^errors
response_param.desc: The list of errors that occurred.

response_param.name: ^^detail
response_param.desc: The details of the main error.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the SKU where the error occurred.

response_param.name: ^^^extra_errors
response_param.desc: A list of secondary errors or issues related to the main error.

response_param.name: ^^^^warehouse_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the warehouse  where the error occurred.

error_code_list.msg: SKU must contain a valid warehouse.
stock count is invalid
Multiple warehouses detected. Include all warehouse IDs and the corresponding details and try again.
Invalid product ID(s) found
The product does not exist
The SKU ID is necessary

Couldn't update inventory. Possible causes:
- Inventory is automatically allocated and cannot be modified manually
- Warehouse IDs provided are incorrect
- Missing warehouse IDs (all warehouses that stock the product must be included)
You cannot edit the specified product(s) as it isn't listed in your account or shop.
A single product cannot have more than 100 different SKUs
The SKU inventory quantity for the warehouse must be within allowed limits.
No multiple warehouse permission
Unable to update the price for SKUs with no warehouse. Assign a warehouse and try again.
The warehouse does not exist
seller has no warehouse
please edit stock from global
sku count must be one and disable variables
receipt brand not support warehouse
The product ID does not exist
There's an ongoing appeal. If you wish to edit product details, please revoke the appeal first.
The warehouse is unavailable because this product cannot be shipped to the target market from this warehouse.
Auction product is bidding when it is not supported to change product info
Product locked for Promotion and stock can't be updated below current stock
The warehouse does not support fulfillment for the current shop.
warehouse is unavailable for eu gpr product
The warehouse ' {{warehouse ID}} ' does not belong to this shop/seller.
The warehouse is disabled.
the warehouse not delivery warehouse
Removal, addition, and change of warehouses are not permitted. Please specify the original warehouses for the SKUs.
Couldn't publish this product as you haven't set the return warehouse for your shop. Add the return warehouse information on TikTok Shop Seller Center first and try again.
Sku id duplicate
The SKU id not exist.
The seller is inactive.
Invalid seller tax number
seller id not exist
You don't have the permission to operate combo.
The stock of combo does not support being edited.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
The product in its current status is not available for this operation. Change the product status and try again.
The SKU list is empty. Either omit the list entirely, or provide all required details.

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.

request_path_param.name: product_id
request_path_param.desc: The product ID generated by TikTok Shop.
